query:
ALTER TABLE professionalReports 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reportRevision INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reportStatus ENUM('draft', 'review', 'final', 'superseded') DEFAULT 'draft' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS previousReportId VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS revisionReason TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS revisionDate TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS revisedBy VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorCertType ENUM('API_510', 'API_570', 'API_653', 'AWS_CWI', 'ASNT_Level_III'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorCertExpiry DATE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorCertValid BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorSignature TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorSignatureDate TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorSignatureHash VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS clientSignature TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS clientSignatureDate TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS clientSignatureName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS clientSignatureTitle VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS complianceDeterminationBasis TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nonComplianceDetails TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nonComplianceCodeSections TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nextInspectionBasis TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS intervalCalculationMethod ENUM('rl_half_or_10_years', 'rbi_extended', 'owner_user_specified', 'regulatory_mandated'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS rbiJustification TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS riskCalculationMethod ENUM('manual', 'calculated', 'rbi_based'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS riskCalculationBasis TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS consequenceOfFailure ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS probabilityOfFailure ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS governingComponentMethod ENUM('automatic', 'manual_override'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS governingComponentBasis TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS governingComponentOverrideReason TEXT;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2vRv1t5JdAedAFZ.807c3fab4c80 --database A4XPjAmiHcgmrps2ZTa96H --execute ALTER TABLE professionalReports 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS reportRevision INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorCertExpiry DATE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorCertValid BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorSignature TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorSignatureDate TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS inspectorSignatureHash VARCHAR(64),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS clientSignature TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS clientSignatureDate TIMESTAMP,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS clientSignatureName VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS clientSignatureTitle VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS complianceDeterminationBasis TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nonComplianceDetails TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nonComplianceCodeSections TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS nextInspectionBasis TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS intervalCalculationMethod ENUM('rl_half_or_10_years', 'rbi_extended', 'owner_user_specified', 'regulatory_mandated'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS rbiJustification TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS riskCalculationMethod ENUM('manual', 'calculated', 'rbi_based'),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS riskCalculationBasis TEXT,

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS probabilityOfFailure ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high', 'critical'),

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS governingComponentBasis TEXT,
